title: Bridal Shower Fruit Slush
directions: Mix orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, pineapple, strawberries, fruit cocktail, and bananas in a large bowl. Freeze until mixture is solid. Thaw for 1 1/2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
